booking.step1Content: Click on the button below and fill in the form with your preferences.
booking.step2: Step 2: Lay back while one of our agents cooks up the perfect experience for you, contacts you with all the details you need and answers all your questions.
booking.step3: Step 3: Confirm and pay to book your spot.
booking.step4: Step 4: Pack your bags and get ready to experience the beauty of Egypt.

payment.policy: Payment & Refund policy details will be here.

faq.bookingTitle: How can I book my Egyptian Experience?

heroSubheader: Create and personalize your dream getaway with SLS Vacation!
overviewParagraph1: Egypt is a captivating destination with rich history, stunning landscapes, and unique experiences.
overviewParagraph2: You can explore the iconic Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx, cruise along the Nile, the longest river globally, and visit Luxor and Aswan. Dive into the crystal-clear waters of the Marsa Alam, home to vibrant corals and colorful fish.
overviewParagraph3: Enjoy dreamy beach getaways along the Red Sea coast and bask in year-round sunshine. Experience the welcoming nature of the Egyptian people.
carouselSubheader: Come visit Egypt and enjoy your dream vacation today with competitive prices!
introduction: I'm Hanya, your assigned Travel Agent. Once we get on this discovery call, I'll walk you through our destinations & answer all your inquiries about your upcoming travels!
inquiry: Which trip are you inquiring about?
errorMessage: Error submitting form. Please try again later.
additionalInfo: ANYTHING YOU WOULD LIKE US TO KEEP IN MIND

destinationOptions.luxor: LUXOR WITH VALLEY OF KINGS BY BUS

tripBooking.title: WHO ARE YOU BOOKING THIS TRIP FOR?

cancelUpTo: Cancel up to 24 hours in advance
keepFlexible: Keep your travel plans flexible — book your spot today.

reserveAndPay: Reserve & pay now to book your spot today!
